author: michal
msg: Minor API clean up and leaving the comments for the future work.
- I started to use the convention when only first name of the class is upper case. So I have Md5Observer not MD5Observer.
- We need to have clear guidline regarding the usage of plexusContainer.release() method. It was not used at  the moment and I used it where ever it was possible.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o adjusting the abstract test case so that fixtures can be setup for the
entire testing session of a wagon. Many of the wagons required embedded
servers to run and we don't want them starting/stopping for each test.

author: jvanzyl
msg: The rest of the wagon modifications will follow.
